description: Webservice mixin. Just subclass Servable, create your class, and transmute it into a webservice with the Servable-inherited wsgi_app method. Plug that method into your favorite webserver, and go. If you dont have a favorite webserver, you can call run_test_server on your Servable-derived class. Thatll do in a pinch.
longdescription: Webservice mixin. Just subclass Servable, create your class, and transmute it into a webservice with the Servable-inherited wsgi_app method. Plug that method into your favorite webserver, and go. If you dont have a favorite webserver, you can call run_test_server on your Servable-derived class. Thatll do in a pinch.
